price: Magkakaroon sila roon ng bungang-kahoy at magkakaroon sila ng anumang ipananawagan nila.
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا فَٰكِهَةٞ وَلَهُم مَّا يَدَّعُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā fākihatun walahum mā yaddaʿūna
